case.title: Cuddling and kissing (London)
case.text: I am single and miss cuddling and having a great make-out session. Not looking for anything more! I prefer to take things slow it would be more enjoyable that way. I am educated, easy going, genuine, thin and a non-smoker. I am a bubbly person. Please be mature, intelligent, down to earth and a non-smoker. If you are geeky and have a car, even better! Please reply with a picture, your age, profession, location etc.
